title: Dorothy Marie and the Unanswered Questions of the Zombie Apocalypse (2013)
overview: A unique dramatic-comedy about a young couple in the early stages of their relationship, facing their first major crossroad when a terrible disease spreads nationwide overnight.  They face what could be their final hour holed up in a basement and amidst it all they must decide what’s next.  A thought-provoking zombie movie from Rogue Lumen.
storyline: "Dorothy Marie and the Unanswered Questions of the Zombie Apocalypse" is a unique dramatic-comedy about a young couple in the early stages of their relationship, facing their first major crossroad when a terrible disease spreads nationwide overnight. They face what could be their final hour holed up in a basement and amidst it all they must decide what's next. It's a thought-provoking zombie movie--That doesn't really contain many zombies...
